title: Add immutable access audit logs for customer signal and PII reads/exports

sections.text: Implement server-side audit logging for read access to customer signals that may contain PII, including API reads, UI views of raw records, and any export/download actions. Each log entry must capture workspace, actor (user/service), timestamp, action type, resource identifiers, and request context (IP/user agent). Store logs in an append-only/immutable datastore with admin-only retrieval endpoints and basic filters (time range, actor, resource).
